select pm.purchaseno, pm.orderdate, ci.clientname, i.itemname, imc.amount, imc.quantity, imc.unitprice, ws.warehousename, pm.purchasestatus from purchase_management as pm LEFT JOIN client_information as ci on pm.clientno = ci.clientno LEFT JOIN item as i on pm.itemno = i.itemno LEFT JOIN item_middle_client as imc on pm.imcno = imc.imcno LEFT JOIN warehouse as ws on pm.warehouseno = ws.warehouseno where trim(ci.clientname)!=''
and pm.purchaseno = #{purchaseNo}

select pm.purchaseno, pm.itemno, i.itemname, i.warehousingcost, imc.quantity, imc.amount from purchase_management pm , item_middle_client imc , item i where pm.purchaseno = imc.purchaseno and i.itemcode = imc.itemcode and pm.purchaseno = #{purchaseNo}
